bill_title: provide oversight of the immigrant investor program.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide oversight of the immigrant investor program. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 1-53 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The commissioner of the Governor's Office of Economic Development shall provide an annual report before July first of each year, to the Government Operations and Audit Committee of the Legislature with information regarding the use of the federal EB-5 program to promote job creation and investment of capital in the South Dakota economy and how this program assists the Governor's Office of Economic Development execute its functions and purpose pursuant to §§ 1-53-3 and 1-53-4. The information to be provided includes: (1) The amount of each immigrant's investment of capital. Capital includes such things as cash, equipment, inventory, other tangible property, cash equivalents, or indebtedness secured by assets owned by the immigrant; (2) The business or economic development opportunity that is the object of each immigrant's investment; (3) The employment opportunities or jobs that are expected to be created in South Dakota; (4) The source of the capital documented through the production of: (a) Foreign business records; or (b) Personal, corporate, partnership, or other entity tax returns of any kind filed within five years with any taxing jurisdiction by or on behalf of the immigrant investor. (5) The State's targeted employment area; and (6) The designation of any public or private economic entity which is involved with the promotion of economic growth under the EB-5 program for the Governor's Office of Economic Development and the oversight exercised by the entity regarding economic development grants, loans, funds, or immigrant investments.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
